description: A symbol of prosperity and fertility, the Manga Maalai is a cherished heirloom piece. This Swarna Rekha Haaram combines traditional Telugu artistry with modern diamond setting techniques for a dazzling effect. The piece represents enduring style and cultural heritage, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. Offers a timeless charm that transcends generations.
